=File Rename Engine=

==Functions==

 * Mask, NMask, EMask  (mask plugins)
 * SR, NSR, ESR
 * Case, NCase, ECase
 * UDF (Filter etc...)

==Chain Example==

{{{
Presets\dummy.mrs
 Mask("[C10+5:2]. [N4-]")  
 SR("_", " ", "full") 
 Case("Upper")  
 Mask("backup [N] backup")
}}}

== API ==
 # NewFileList := Rename(FileList, mrs, [Handler, bSimulate]) - Evaluate rename functions on a file list
 # Undo(FileList, NewFileList)

 * Handler(Filename, p1, p2, p3) 
  * triggered before renaming, return ErrorLevel to influence it (1 skip, 2 stop)
  * events: beforeRename: (p1=no, p2=newfilename), errorMessage: (p1=no, p2=newfileame, p3=errmsg)

== Preview ==
{{{
Rename( mrs, VisibleFiles, PreviewHandler)

PreviewHandler(no, filename, newfilename) {
   UpdateColumn(Top+no, newFileName)
}
}}}
